185206593.review:
LE jeu de stratégie.
J'ai connu SWR sur windows 95. Graphiquement, cela ne vaut pas un AgeOfEmpire. Mais aucun jeu de gestion n'arrive à la cheville de SWR de par son monde et son immersion.

185205599.review: An awesome game of Galactic chess.  Been playing this game since 1995.  Great strategy, ship building, diplomacy missions, recruitment.  Way ahead of its time!  Wish someone did a redo of this game, for sure!

185072197.review: A classic game of space conquest set in the Star Wars Universe.

184872397.review: I like that this game is based on the original trilogy. You can also choose to play as the empire or the rebellion. The music in the background is nostalgic.

184438705.review: The game is just as fun as it was when I got it way back in the day.  Challenging and interesting.  A well made game that has lasted all these years.

184387078.review: Make sure you find the manual for the game. I didn't know what i was doing and i accidentally bombed Kashyyk.

184287194.review: old but gold... unfortunatly a bit buggy with windows 11

183899769.review:
old game but with solid gameplay definite recommend if you like these galaxy strategy games, it is like stellaris but simpler , but make no mistake, this game is also complex.

that is what it reminds me of, due to most of the game being plotting your next move at the galaxy map. 

 the whole game is basically a 1 v 1, vs a determined AI opponent player who undermines and does the unexpected sometimes. you learn to really hate your opponent faction. it gets personal.
 some solid gameplay here. it is a great feeling to destroy some of their ships after some hard plotting of strategy in a space battle. ships are valuable, they take a long time and resources to build, and then deploy, so if you manage to catch one enemy ship and then trap / bait it and destroy it, it is a great win and very epic. i think contemplative strategy game players who like ambeince will enjoy this game a lot.

now on the bugs.
 the graphics not showing properly bug (in space combat) but i needed a mod called voodoo to emulate past versions of direct x to get the graphics to be fixed . this fixes the graphics.

on the random crashes after / before space combat, a patch to verion 1.02 made by someone seems to fix it, but fingers crossed i dont get any crashes , i havent for a while, not saying they wont happen tho, and i fought many space battles since i copy and pasted his patch into the game files.

 anyhow i am somewhat noob in this game. i played it over 20 years ago. 
it was good then it is good now.

a 1 v 1 is usually good competitive game, the rivalry between the players is engrossing, but in this game where you can spy, sabotage, assassinate, abduct, overthrow, construct, mine, research, and fight space battles, etc it is epic and you dont know what the AI will do but you do know that you hate them and must defeat their faction at aNY COST!

well in this game, strategy is king. a good game, play it in the dark with some solitude for a magical experience.

183562539.review: Un excellent jeu de stratégie et de gestion spatial. Une référence
